Label.en: It came from Dieppe, or other ports on the Channel

Label.en: On Fridays, people would either eat fish, or nothing at all, so it was pretty important!

Label.en: For a few hundred years, men on food would walk alongside horses loaded with fish baskets

Label.es: For a few hundred years, men on food would walk alongside horses loaded with fish baskets
Label.zh: For a few hundred years, men on food would walk alongside horses loaded with fish baskets

Label.en: After each tide, they would walk day and night to Paris
Label.fr: After each tide, they would walk day and night to Paris
Label.es: After each tide, they would walk day and night to Paris
Label.zh: After each tide, they would walk day and night to Paris

Label.en: No way... walking 200km only takes two or three days with the right incentives... and there were many!
